features: Skin Elements Intimate Wash for Women is a complete intimate hygiene solution that controls sweat, itching, dryness, irritation, and rashes. The Skin Elements Intimate Wash for Women contains lactic acid that restores the pH balance of your privates for a soothing feeling all day long.

Rose and Chamomile Floral Water - Rose and Chamomile are known for their healing properties, used topically on the skin rose water restores skin to its natural hydration. Chamomile water is a soothing agent that has gentle yet potent properties.

Calendula and Aloe Vera Extracts - Aloe Vera and Calendula extracts complement each other and this special combination is beneficial for intimate skin. Aloe Vera with Calendula provides effective moisturization without making the skin greasy.
Tea Tree Oil - Tea tree oil is a natural agent that gently cleanses the intimate area and keeps the bad odor at bay.
Witch Hazel - A natural astringent that cleanses the skin of impurities, witch hazel eases all kinds of skin irritation and troubles. It also treats razor bumps and keeps skin calm and soothed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I like this intimate wash. It leaves me feeling soft and fresh. It has a soft rose smell to it, not too strong. I just don't like that it is almost like scented water. It isnt thick like liquid soap, but it does lather good enough forming lots of bubbles. Maybe its better thin consistency, for intimate parts. Good for sensitive skin. I have seen others write that they use it all over face and body. I haven't, but do want to try on my face as well. Overall I am satisfied and will probably buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s really great but I’m just worried about the scent because it is a little bit too much and I’m not sure of that’s safe for down there to use on like daily basis or every day, but other than that it’s really good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeping it fresh!
reviews.reviewText: Who knew that something like this Intimate Wash for Women would be so important! Being an oldster, and now having a slight incontinence problem, the idea of "keeping it fresh" and odor-free is very important. This product is quite nice, it's a medium pink liquid in a clear plastic 4.05 oz. bottle with built-in pump in the lid, and with a paper label all around the bottle. When the liquid is pumped out it becomes a pure white sudsy foam that dissipates quickly when applied to the area. There's a lovely soft rose/floral scent that doesn't last long. There are more very good ingredients listed, and it can be used as often as needed. The instructions say to wet the area first, apply gently, let set for about 25 - 45 seconds, and rinse. Easy to use, leaves a nice clean and confidant odor-free area, plus there's the benefit of the good pH balance to keep everything healthy! There's no soap, just a very fine cleansing combination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: If you're like me, and prone to PH imbalances, this soap is for you. It has a mild, inoffensive fragrance, and it's also very soothing. Should not irritate sensitive skin. Make sure to let it sit for 30-45 seconds, as directed, to maximize its usefulness. Will be ordering more. It has become part of my routine, along with some good probiotics!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strongly Floral, Non-Irritating
reviews.reviewText: The Skin Elements Intimate wash came well packaged with a cap and pump dispenser. My wife tried it and liked how soft and soothing it was on her skin. It comes out as a foamy wash that quickly dissipates once applied. There was no irritation. It's PH balanced and includes rose water, chamomile floral water, calendula flower extract, witch hazel extract, aloe vera leaf extract and tea tree oil etc.. There's also "fragrance" and amaranth dye (color C.l. 16185), found in food and cosmetics. The dye has not been approved by the US FDA. It's strongly floral, so if fragrance in an intimate wash is not your thing, you may want to skip this one.Made in India~ Kort

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This feminine women’s intimate wash does a nice job of cleaning and is gentle and nondrying. I like that this product works to keep a normal pH down there. It smells very nice and definitely smells like roses. I like the the ingredients are mostly clean. However I’m not a big fan that it has fragrance, as they usually contain Phthalates. I like the foam dispenser as it’s easier to control how much comes out of the container. I like that this can remove any unwanted odor and itching and also has antibacterial properties. Nice cleanser for LadyBits.
The texture of foam is thick and gentle. Smell is not too strong. I use it also for my face, because it prevents my skin from drying.

this product is really good , its foam based and has fragrance of rose and chamomile, soothing to my skin.absolutely no irritation done to my skin. Also it is pocket friendly and comes in a pump bottle , which is easy to use .Definitely one of my best buy!!

If u are looking for a foamier intimate wash, this is not the one. Could barely get a proper lather to give my intimate area a thorough clean. Did not wash away any of the sweat or smell . Literally is like water. Going in the garbage .

One of the best Intimate wash for Women . It is a really good hygiene wash. This intimate wash contains rose and chamomile floral water. It have a mild and refreshing fragrance . It is a mild cleanser that acts like an antifungal cream for private part for women. I highly recommend buying it ☺️
The smell of this product is lovely. However , the product itself caused me irritation. I would not recommend this for any woman who is sensitive . The value for money is ok if it works for you.
